query: select * from t1 union all select * from t2 order by x asc
select distinct * from t1 union select distinct * from t2 order by x asc
select * from t1 except select * from t2 order by x asc
select distinct * from t1 except select * from t2 order by x asc
select * from t1 intersect select * from t2 order by x asc
select distinct * from t1 intersect select * from t2 order by x asc
select * from t1 order by x asc
select distinct * from t1 order by x asc
select x from t1 order by (x) asc
select x from t1 order by y asc, (x) asc
select x, count() from t1 group by (x) order by (x) asc
select * from (select x, z from t1 order by (x) asc) union all select * from (select y, z from t2 order by (y) asc) order by z asc
select * from (select x, z from t1 order by (x) asc) except select * from (select y, z from t2 order by (y) asc) order by z asc
select * from (select x, z from t1 order by (x) asc) intersect select * from (select y, z from t2 order by (y) asc) order by z asc
